Published November 18 2014

AnandTech reviews the OnePlus One

AnandTech reviews the OnePlus One — If I were switching to Android, the OnePlus One is the only phone I would consider getting. My buddy has one, and the build is just great; I think it feels better in the hand than the iPhone 6 does.

Enjoy your day.
